title: Home
text:
PhD student in Quantitative Psychology at UC Merced. I work on Bayesian mixture models for longitudinal data, simulation studies, and reproducible workflows.

text: This is my first post. I‚Äôll use this space for research notes, methods write-ups, and reproducible examples as I work on Bayesian mixture modeling and simulation studies.
